description: The first question everyone has is 'Who is that cover model with theperfect open hole?' Well guys, it is our newest discovery, Sean Harris.Sean was an instant hit with our staff and Chris Ward thought he wasone of the hottest fisting men he had ever met. Sean is a furrychested heart-throb in his early 30s. He is another Mark Evrett andhis personality and fisting ability will make you think that Mark is backin front of the camera again! In short, this guy is as good as it getsand his talented hole is must see! Sean will be the hottest new star of2005--WE GUARANTEE!!! So who did we get to top Mr. Harris? Noneother than french fisting top Taurus (remember his scene with SimonCox in Tool Box #3). We flew Taurus in because we wanted Sean'sscreen debut to feature over-the-top fisting. And boy did we get it!This scene alone is over 45 minutes long and features 3 or 4 differentfisting positions. Chris himself was amazed by the scene andconsiders it to be right at the top of all the many scenes he hasdirected. Sean and Taurus do everything from deep fisting topunching--there is even some excellent DOUBLE fisting as Harristakes both of Taurus' hands at the same times. You should see howhis butt lips are smiling!!!
title: Construction Zone 1 - Blue Collar Butthole, Scene #01
